name: BeWealth
0:
”Alexa, ask Be Wealth to tell me about the company”
”Alexa, ask Be Wealth to tell me about the Founder”
”Alexa, ask Be Wealth to play the latest update”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: be wealth
Developer Terms of Use
des:
At Be Wealth we offer investments, access to insurance, and comprehensive financial planning. Regardless of your life stage, income, or goals, we can work with you to create a financial plan to help you manage your short-term goals, long-term aspirations and work toward meeting your financial targets.

Enable this skill and say, "Alexa, play the latest update from Be Wealth."

Other things you can ask:

First say, "Alexa, open Be Wealth."

"Tell me about the company."
"Tell me about Brandon Ebert." / "Tell me about the Founder."
"Tell me about Kevin Quinley." / "Tell me about the Financial Advisor."
"Play the latest update."

Learn more: bewealth.com

Request an invite to launch your own custom Alexa skill like this at WealthVoice.ai
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
